snippet: An Etihad Airways flight from Cairo to Abu Dhabi was diverted to a military air base in Dubai on Sunday for “security reasons,” the airline said.
abstract: United Arab Emirates airline Etihad Airways diverts flight going from Cairo to Abu Dhabi to military base in Dubai, citing unspecified security reasons; Islamic State sympathizers reportedly posted threats against flight to their Twitter accounts.
lead_paragraph: An Etihad Airways flight from Cairo to Abu Dhabi was diverted to a military air base in Dubai on Sunday for “security reasons,” the airline said.

headline.main: Dubai: Flight Diverted After Social Media Threats
headline.print_headline: Dubai: Flight Diverted After Social Media Threats

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
